resources.string: Indian Calculator is a Open Source Android App Project, you can modify, customize, add new options, etc. This open source calculator first made by Kishan Nath.

My name in Kishan Nath, I have made this application. Indian calculator is a simple calculator Android application, you can easily calculate the basic calculation, its interface is quite interesting and it is also very easy to use.
All the photos shown in the application are all taken from the icons8.com website.
Note: Indian Calculator application does not collect any user\'s data nor store it anywhere.
